taskDescription: Sophia deposited $4,000 in an account that earns 5.5% interest compounded yearly. After 20 years, Sophia withdrew all the money in the account to pay for her childâ€™s college. How much money was in the account when Sophia withdrew the money?
detailedSolution: The amount in the account was $11,671.03 (rounded to two decimal places).
